short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track your screen time across websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever wonder how much time you’ve spent on YouTube?
Need a reminder of when to take a break?

Welcome to TimedReminders! Download TimedReminders, set your websites, and get pop-up reminders after a time set by you.

Why you’ll love it:
- A user-friendly extension to help you stay on track
- Helps you stay in check and not waste any more time
- Easy to use, with an eye-catching UI
- Keeps you in the flowstate while making you aware of time

Let’s get started:
- Select the extension in the top right corner of your Chrome browser
- Add websites and set a time limit
- View your websites on the dashboard
- Watch a reminder pop up when you reach your time limit
- Choose to keep persevering, or take a break
- Enjoy being mindful!
